summary.para: This method sets High Dynamic Range (HDR) and Wide Color Gamut (WCG) header metadata.

param.name: Type
param.para: Specifies one member of the enum.

param.name: Size
param.para: Specifies the size of pMetaData, in bytes.

param.name: pMetaData
param.para: Specifies a void pointer that references the metadata, if it exists. Refer to the structure.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

remarks.para: This method sets metadata to enable a monitor's output to be adjusted depending on its capabilities.

summary.para: This interface exposes a single method for setting video metadata.
